text: American Arts Gold Medallions were made by the U.S. Mint but are not coins. ==One Ounce Set== *1980 - Grant Wood *1981 - Mark Twain *1982 - Louis Armstrong *1983 - Robert Frost *1984 - Helen Hayes ==Half Ounce Set== *1980 - Marian Anderson *1981 - Willa Cather *1982 - Frank Lloyd Wright *1983 - Alexander Calder *1984 - John Steinbeck Category:Money Category:Cultural history
title: American Arts Commemorative Series medallions
